import './App.css'; import { Button, Grid, Toolbar, IconButton, Typography, AppBar } from '@material-ui/core'; import MenuIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Menu'; import ArrowBackIcon from '@material-ui/icons/ArrowBack'; function App() { var QRCode = require('qrcode.react') return ( <>
); } function MainButton({ buttonName }) { return } function TopBar() { return QRtender } export default App;
